```{r load library, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(forcats)
library(ggridges)
```

Problem 1


```{r load tidy data}
pups_data = read_csv("./data/FAS_pups.csv",
  col_types = "ciiiii") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  gather(key = outcome, value = post_natal_days, pd_ears:pd_walk) %>%
  mutate(
    outcome = str_replace(outcome, "pd_", "")
    ) %>%
  filter(post_natal_days != "NA")
```
